features: HAN SOLO: The exploits of Han Solo are legendary – he’s been a smuggler, captain of the Millennium Falcon, and hero of the Rebel Alliance. Solo once again finds himself in the center of the action
THE ARCHIVE COLLECTION: Epic figures from the Star Wars The Black Series return with the Black Series Archive 6-inch-scale action figures, featuring premium deco and design
MOVIE-BASED CHARACTER-INSPIRED ACCESSORY: This Star Wars The Black Series action figure comes with 1 entertainment-inspired accessory that makes a great addition to any Star Wars collection
FIND OTHER FIGURES FROM A GALAXY FAR, FAR AWAY: Find movie- and entertainment-inspired Star Wars The Black Series figures to build a Star Wars galaxy (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
PREMIUM ARTICULATION AND DETAILING: Star Wars fans and collectors can display this fully articulated figure featuring poseable head, arms, and legs, as well as premium deco, in their collection
body.description: The exploits of Han Solo are legendary – he’s been a famed smuggler, captain of the Millennium Falcon, and a hero of the Rebel Alliance. Solo once again finds himself in the center of the action Kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and deco, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars The Black Series includes figures, vehicles, and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy, including comics, movies, and animated series. (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.) The 6-inch-scale Black Series figure is detailed to look like the Han Solo character from Star Wars: The Force Awakens, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Star Wars The Black Series Kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars The Black Series includes figures, vehicles, and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy.

Star Wars The Black Series Kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars The Black Series includes figures, vehicles, and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy.

Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Star Wars The Black Series figures are presented in 6-inch scale with realistic detailing, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Star Wars to the next level. Highly poseable with multiple points of articulation, collectors can display these premium figures with pride in their action figure and vehicle collections.

Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Star Wars The Black Series figures are presented in 6-inch scale with realistic detailing, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Star Wars to the next level. Highly poseable with multiple points of articulation, collectors can display these premium figures with pride in their action figure and vehicle collections.

Build a Constellation of Collectibles With a massive catalogue of Rebels, Imperials, bounty hunters, and everyone in between, Star Wars The Black Series action figures make impressive additions to any Star Wars collection—spanning comics, movies, video games, and animated series. Collect them to build an interstellar world of your own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Star War’s Han Solo
reviews.reviewText: Action figure looks really good, great price, fast delivery, my son loved this action figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fiel a la imagine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A gift so awesome it made my wife cry
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my wife, who is a big Harrison Ford fan. The quality and craftsmanship is amazing. Right down to the scar on the chin. Or at least that's what my wife said lol. But all in all this was an amazing quality and value for what I paid. The detail is very well attended to and the packaging is perfect for display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attention to detail
reviews.reviewText: I love that’s it’s so resembles Han to the last detail, I’m super happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really looks like Indiana Jones
reviews.reviewText: This action figure really looks like Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford)! Great fun, but the hands don't really work well to hold the small items it comes with. I just place them both on the 2nd piece of this action figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great if you want to open it
reviews.reviewText: So I ordered this figure twice, the first time the box was opened and retaped. It looked awful and so it went back. Since then, the price dropped, A lot and I decided to try again. The second time around, it was still opened, but since it was way cheaper, I kept him. The detail is amazing, Han looks incredible, he even has the classic Harrison Ford half smile. My only complaint other then the package, is the holster only kind of works. Mine was bent so i had to reshape it over night, and even then only the barrel sticks in. My advice is this, do not get for a collector value, if you want a pristine box, this is not for you. If you want a great looking Han Solo action figure that looks like Harrison Ford, this is your winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars INCREDIBLE likeness to Harrison Ford!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the ideal Harrison Ford han Solo figure, considered to be what it should have been, the likeness is all there, if you've missed the first Force Awaken Han Solo, then worry no more. this is pretty much 20 times better, the articulation could've been a little better. since Hasbro went to all the trouble on sculpting a new head, I'm so very proud to own this figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A must have for any Star Wars fan!
Me gustó muchísimo está figura en los detalles, la pintura y las articulaciones que tiene pues lo recomiendo mucho.
O produto chegou bem embalado e bem protegido, gostei bastante do serviço chegou rápido antes do prazo de entrega e o action figure é muito top! Parabéns e obrigado a BRINQUEDOS TOYSNET
